snippet.title: Venture to the Vile Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
A lost friend, a town-wide curse, and some mysterious new powers…
This is what awaits you in Venture to the Vile, the upcoming metroidvania from AAA industry veterans Cut to Bits, when the game launches on Steam May 7th.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2153750/Venture_to_the_Vile/ 
Discord: https://discord.gg/6kBrKpp7MX
Press contact: cuttobits@playertwopr.com　
Website: https://venturetothevile.com/　
X: https://twitter.com/CutToBits (EN)   
    https://twitter.com/VTTV_JP (JP)

#vttv #venturetothevile #metroidvania #aniplex #studiocuttobits
